name: What Happens on my Desk
description:
The lords of Deskland are having a feud to take control, but the more time passes the more they seem to lose it.

In this game you are trying to collect power orbs which raise your score, and shoot your opponent to hinder his movement, but be aware reality is glitching and affecting your ability to control yourself by shuffling your inputs around. Will you be able to get the bearings on your new controls first or will your adversary adapt faster and take victory.
